name: RVG X-ray Image
summary: Learn about .RVG files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: There are several editions of the Kodak RVG software, including 6500, 6200, 6100, and 5100. Trophy RVG Mobile program can only be used to view RVG images taken by the Kodak RVG 6500 program.

description: Image format used by dental radiography systems developed by Kodak; created by dental imaging sensors to store x-ray images of a patient's mouth.
